p.k: The daily struggles of wildlife in the African nation, beginning with a look at how quickly young animals have to learn to hunt prey or evade predators
Interesting behaviour in the natural world, including escape acts, unpredictable tricks and feats of survival
Documentary following naturalist Casey Anderson and his best friend, grizzly bear Brutus, as they trek from Yellowstone National Park to Alaska's Kodiak Island
Casey Anderson returns to his wildlife hotspots as spring brings the animals back out, and in Montana, Brutus and the other creatures emerge from hibernation
Naturalist Casey Anderson travels to Yellowstone National Park to observe the survival techniques of the resident grizzly bears, from hibernation to preying on elk calves
Documentary exploring unusual animal friendships, including a dog that swims to visit a dolphin and one that has formed a bond with a cheetah
Part one of a two-part special in which Simon Keys and Siouxsie Gillett showcase some of the series' toughest snakes
Documentary about the conflict between three lion prides living along Tanzania's Mwagusi River, as they compete for food and territory
Two lions exiled from their pride set out to form their own territory, but face constant struggles with rivals
A male lion resumes his former role as leader, while a younger animal is evicted from the pride and faces an uncertain future
A look back at highlights from the series shining a light on unlikely and unusual animal friendships, including a tortoise that struggles to keep up with his hippo friend
83% One-year-old wild dog pups learn to hunt as a pack in Zambia's Luangwa Valley
Examining the reasons why a volcanic island in the Indian Ocean that has become a hot spot for sharks, leading to the deaths of nine people in the last seven years
Documentary exploring why species of sharks that have always been solitary predators have adapted to work in packs to catch their prey
Marine scientists examine why sharks are coming closer to shore in search of prey, from age and aggression to human interactions and underwater acoustics
Marine biologist Kori Garza sets out to find a giant tiger shark named Kamakai and uncovers the mystery that brought her to the French Polynesian waters

p.n: Shark Attack Investigation: The Paige Winter Story
p.k: The story of a woman who lost a leg and part of her hand to a shark attack when she was 17. Experts try to determine what kind of shark it was that attacked her
Experts investigate the cause of a series of 23 attacks on the island of Reunion in the Indian Ocean, including nine fatalities
Two children are attacked by sharks within an hour on the New York resort of Fire Island. Experts try to uncover the cause of the first attacks
Documentary about the conflict between three lion prides living along Tanzania's Mwagusi River, as they compete for food and territory
Two lions exiled from their pride set out to form their own territory, but face constant struggles with rivals
